programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Doctor Who: The Mind of Evil, S01E04, The mind parasite within the Keller Machine becomes too powerful for the Master to control. It learns how to move on its own and goes on the hunt for new minds.

programme.title: Episode 5

programme.title: Episode 6

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E20, A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl, but with only circumstantial evidence to go on, police must let the case go cold. And a woman asks the police to reopen the 24-year-old case of her cousin's disappearance.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E01, In this special 100th edition of Cold Case Files, we look at the biggest serial murder case in U.S. history; hunt for the Green River Killer. Dave Reichert, the detective who made finding the killer his obsession, walks us through the case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E04, Work of an Alberta, Canada detective finally pays off when he tracks down the man who murdered a 6-year-old girl 10 years earlier. And when police search for the killer of a hitchhiker, they find that the victim's diary is one of their best clues.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E10, A detective vows not to shave until he solves the murder of a young Oregon woman. It takes three years and a string of Mexican Mafia informants to crack the case and allow the dedicated detective to shave his beard.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E22, The killing of a woman in a VA goes unsolved for a quarter of a century before investigators are finally able to zero in on the likely killer. And, in 1999 detectives test the blood evidence and develop a DNA profile of a shooting death from 1980.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S09E02, The murder of an Ohio woman in 1974 is solved more than 20 years later after police get a crucial clue--the woman's husband was seen building a coffin-shaped box about the time the woman disappeared.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil At The Door
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E02, When 36-year-old computer programmer Lisa Valdez fails to show up for work, her apartment manager finds her brutally murdered. Detectives ask, could she be the victim of a brutal serial killer? Or was Lisa murdered by someone she knew?

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.
MST3K: Pod People, 19910615000000 +0000, A child adopts a large egg which hatches into a mischievous alien, while a group of pop musicians on a wilderness vacation runs into trouble.

MST3K: Stranded In Space, 19910629000000 +0000, The gang on the SoL have a gag-weapon war with the Mads and watch an unsuccessful TV pilot about an astronaut stuck on an Earth-like planet where ;perfect order; rules.

MST3K: Viking Women And The Sea Serpent, 19911026000000 +0000, The crew watches an educational short about the wonders a home economics major can do for young women in The Home Economics Story (1951). In The Saga of the Viking Women Sea Serpent (1957), lonely Viking women set sail to rescue a group of enslaved men.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Hired! (Part 2)
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E18, Advance your career by finishing this enlightening two-part short featuring timeless sales advice.

programme.title: Backlot: The History Of MST3K, Pt. 1
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K, S01E49, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.

MST3K: Gamera, 19910608000000 +0000, A giant mutated turtle wakes from eons of slumber and attacks Japan in Gamera: The Giant Monster (1965). The Bots create their own beauty salon and are treated to a visit from Gamera himself.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.
MST3K: Beyond Atlantis, 20220508000000 +0000, A new test subject arrives on the Simulator of Love, and her crew watches BEYOND ATLANTIS (1973).

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 2: Death Stalks The Highways
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E11, Bela Lugosi stars as Dr. Zorka, inventor of a lethal mechanical spider.
MST3K: Santo In The Treasure Of Dracula, 20220506000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch SANTO IN THE TREASURE OF DRACULA (1969). The Mads introduce the Gizmoplex.
Christmas with Tucker, 20131125000000 +0000, Thirteen-year-old George struggles to deal with the death of his father and is helped through this trying time by his friendship with a dog named Tucker.

I'll Be Home for Christmas, 20161127000000 +0000, Jackie Foster has the perfect life until her dad Jack returns home and reluctantly agrees to spend Christmas with her and her daughter Gracie. Stars James Brolin, Mena Suvari and Giselle Eisenberg.

Love Always, Santa, 20161106000000 +0000, After losing her husband 3 years ago, Celia never thought she'd fall in love again. Now, her world revolves around taking care of her daughter Lilly. Lilly writes a letter to Santa with one wish, for her mom to find love again.

Lucky Christmas, 20111112000000 +0000, Holly Ceroni is devastated when she learns her winning lottery ticket is in her stolen car. But what happens when the man behind it falls for Holly? Stars Elizabeth Berkley and Jason Gray-Stanford.

The Christmas Shepherd, 20141123000000 +0000, Buddy, a German Shepherd born on Christmas Day, means the world to widowed children's author Sally Brown. When a thunderstorm causes Buddy to run away from home, he ends up being adopted by a single father and his daughter.

programme.title: Cease and Desist
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. All the widows in Coal Valley receive eviction notices from the Coal Company.

programme.title: A Telling Silence
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth helps a mute student who is struggling to cope with death.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Schoolteacher Elizabeth and Constable Jack's relationship starts to heat up.

Ellen Foster, 19971214000000 +0000, An 11 year old girl is left an orphan when her mother commits suicide and her abusive, alcoholic father drinks himself to death. Stars Jena Malone, Julie Harris and Debra Monk. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.
Smart Cookies, 20120818000000 +0000, A high-maintenance realtor forced to do community service must lead a group of hopeless girl scouts in the regional cookie drive competition.

So You Said Yes, 20150207000000 +0000, A woman who avoids relationships opens a vintage bridal shop, and goes head-to-head with the snobbish owner of the town's classical bridal shop-only to find out her rival is the mother of her new boyfriend.

programme.title: Fail Safe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E17, As an asteroid hurtles toward Earth, SG-1 uses an abandoned Goa'uld ship as a launch pad for a mega-bomb designed to destroy the rock before impact. But when SGC loses the ship's signal, it's feared that the team is dead and that Earth is in peril.

programme.title: The Warrior
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E18, K'tano, former First Prime of the late Imhotep, is now the leader of a powerful Jaffa rebellion. SG-1 visits his stronghold in hopes of securing an alliance. But O'Neill soon learns that this strategic partnership may well come at a heavy price.

programme.title: Menace
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E19, A dormant female android discovered on a barren planet is transported back to Earth for study. On reactivation, she exhibits a childlike innocence. But soon, SG-1 discovers that this seemingly innocent being may hold a dangerous secret.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E20, Col. O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) must enlist the aid of a couple of convicted felons in a bid to save a planet from the Goa'uld. With an attack looming, an entire world's salvation rests in the hands of SG-1 and two former NID operatives.

programme.title: Meridian
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E21, Exposed to a lethal dose of radiation, Jackson has just hours to live. SG-1 tries everything in its power to save him, but as the hours tick away, Jackson's spirit meets with each member individually to discuss his next mission: life after death.

programme.title: Revelations
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E22, Still dealing with the death of one of their own, SG-1 must put its mourning aside in order to confront the warlord Anubis—who has captured the Asgard leader Thor so he can extract the secrets of their ancient technology for universal domination.

programme.title: Redemption (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E01, The SG-1 team faces two potential disasters light years apart as an energy build-up in the Stargate threatens to destroy Earth, and Teal'c (Christopher Judge) returns home to find his wife dead, his son estranged and his planet under attack.

programme.title: Redemption (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E02, As Teal'c and his son battle to save Earth, O'Neill pilots the X-3, a newly designed interstellar spacecraft that will carry the Stargate far away from Earth so it can explode harmlessly in deep space. But how will SG-1 operate without the Stargate?

programme.title: Descent
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E03, The SG-1 team investigates an abandoned Goa'uld ship orbiting the Earth. While they try to salvage the ship, saboteurs attack and the vessel plummets to Earth, deep into the ocean, with O'Neill and his crew trapped inside…and time running out.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E04, An alien that might predate human evolution by 50 million years is discovered in Antarctica and may be part of the race that invented the Stargate. After SG-1 manages to thaw her back to life, they discover she may be the source of a deadly virus.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E13, When an alarm sounds, McKay suspects that a highly infectious disease has triggered the city’s self-protection system. With vital systems affected, the Atlantis team finds themselves trapped in various sections of the city with no way out.

programme.title: Harmony
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E14, Wanting to maintain diplomatic relations, Sheppard and McKay accompany Harmony, a precocious young princess, on a mandatory rite of passage. However, they are unaware that she has enemies, and character flaws, yet to be dealt with.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E15, When Lt. Colonel John Sheppard receives word that his father has passed away he returns to Earth. But once there, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous experiment gone awry—a human form Replicator now on the loose that must be recaptured at all cost.

programme.title: Trio
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E16, During an off-world mission in a village rocked by fierce tremors, Col. Samantha Carter, Dr. McKay, and Dr. Keller become trapped when they fall into a sinkhole. But every attempt to escape the confines of the chamber puts them in further jeopardy.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E17, The IOA has entrusted Mr. Coolidge, with interviewing Teyla Emmagan and Ronan Dex about their suitability to continue with the Atlantis expedition. Unbeknownst to anyone, a plan by the Wraith to invade the Midway station is about to be initiated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E19, After an unforeseen return, Dr. Carson Beckett shares that he has been held captive. As Teyla is re-united with some missing fellow Athosians, she begins to formulate a plan to ensure their escape, if she is able to find them in time.

programme.title: The Back Story

programme.title: Home and Away

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S03E012, Dylan and Brenda's relationship become strained, while David encourages Donna to have sex with him.

programme.title: Shark Island

programme.title: Shark Fever
